scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p ./output/obsidian-file-explorer-plus/ && mv main.js ./output/obsidian-file-explorer-plus/ && cp manifest.json styles.css ./output/obsidian-file-explorer-plus/
scripts.bump-version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
